page.title: 16LANGUAGE.
page.content: MOST OF THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN OUR BLOCK SPEAK ENGLISH AS THEIR MAIN LANGUAGE.SOME FAMILIES CAME FROM OTHER COUNTRIES AND A FEW OF THEM SPEAK OTHER LANGUAGES AS WELL AS ENGLISH. A LOT OF THE PEOPLE HERE SPEAK WITH A BIRMINGHAM ACCENT.WE OFTEN DO NOT SAY OUR H'S WHEN WE SPEAK AND USE SOME WRONG WORDS LIKE CAN INSTEAD OF MAY, AND WAS WHEN WE SHOULD SAY WERE. OUR TEACHER SAYS THAT OUR LANGUAGE IS CHANGING BECAUSE WE ARE ALWAYS LEARNING NEW WORDS AND FORGETTING OTHERS.WE NOW TALK ABOUT COMPUTERS,PROGRAMS AND OTHER NEW THINGS. SOME PEOPLE USE VERY BAD LANGUAGE IN THIS AREA. THE MOST COMMON FOREIGN LANGUAGE TAUGHT IN SCHOOLS IS FRENCH. GERMAN, SPANISH AND LATIN ARE ALSO TAUGHT IN SOME SCHOOLS.
